headline: Microchip Technology to Present at the Citi 2025 Global TMT Conference
summary: CHANDLER, Arizona, Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- (NASDAQ:MCHP) – Microchip Technology Incorporated, a leading provider of smart, connected, and secure embedded control solutions, today announced that the Company will present at the Citi 2025 Global TMT Conference on Thursday, September 4, 2025 at 7:30 a.m. (Eastern Time). Presenting for the Company will be Mr. Steve Sanghi, President, Chief Executive Officer and Chairman. A live webcast of the presentation will be made available by Citi, an
